text.autoconfig.autoHarvest.title: Auto Harvest Setting
text.autoconfig.autoharvest.option.autoS: Automatically switches to a Fortune-enchanted tool in your hotbar when in Harvest mode.
text.autoconfig.autoharvest.option.coolD: Cooldown between interactions with feedable entities in Feed mode, in §aseconds§r.
text.autoconfig.autoharvest.option.enabl: When enabled, automatically refills the item required for the current mode into your hand (requires holding the item).
text.autoconfig.autoharvest.option.fishi: Stops fishing when the fishing rod's remaining uses drop below this value.
Automatically stops fishing when the fishing rod's durability is too low.
text.autoconfig.autoharvest.option.radiu: Maximum distance for interacting with blocks/entities (in blocks). Example: 35 = 3.5 blocks.
text.autoconfig.autoharvest.option.remem: When AutoHarvest is toggled on, it restores the last used mode automatically.
text.autoconfig.autoharvest.option.theCu: The current mode. Changes take effect after re-toggling the mod.
text.autoconfig.autoharvest.title: AutoHarvest Configuration
text.autoconfig.autoharvest.option.bambo: The spacing between two bamboo plants when planting in Plant Mode. [§cOnly enforces spacing; cannot guarantee neat alignment.§f]
text.autoconfig.autoharvest.option.autoS: Auto-switches to the appropriate hotbar item. Does not affect Harvest mode and Fishing mode.
text.autoconfig.autoharvest.option.ticks: Number of game ticks between actions. Lower values mean faster execution (1 tick = 1 action per tick).
autoharvest.mode.fishing.error: §a[AutoHarvest] §cThe fishing bobber is stuck — please check its position!
text.autoconfig.autoharvest.option.fishi: The interval between retracting the fishing rod and automatically casting it again, in ticks.
text.autoconfig.autoharvest.option.autoS: Automatically switch to the fishing rod in the hotbar when in fishing mode.
text.autoconfig.autoharvest.option.keepW: When you need the farmland to remain moist
